issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Create a default alloy project with the following:

index.xml
{code}
<Alloy>
	<Window class="container">
		 <ListView id="list">
	        <ListSection>
	            <ListItem title="List item 1" accessoryType="Ti.UI.LIST_ACCESSORY_TYPE_DISCLOSURE"></ListItem>
	            <ListItem title="List item 2" accessoryType="Ti.UI.LIST_ACCESSORY_TYPE_DISCLOSURE"></ListItem>
	            <ListItem title="List item 3" accessoryType="Ti.UI.LIST_ACCESSORY_TYPE_DISCLOSURE"></ListItem>
	        </ListSection>
	    </ListView>
	</Window>
</Alloy>
{code}

See screenshots for the result. There is no issue on iPhone.
fields.summary: iOS: iPad - List View width is not all the way to the edges.

comments.body: Hello , we've fixed this issue for another ticket. If you download our newest GA (5.1.0 :http://builds.appcelerator.com.s3.amazonaws.com/index.html#5_1_X) it should fix the issue. Thanks.
Closing ticket as duplicate as the relevant ticket is linked above.
